EmailTemplate.subject: Compliance Week Annual Conference - Last Remaining Sponsorship Ops
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
With about a month to go to the Annual Compliance Week Conference, we have a few remaining sponsorship options available. This represents a prime opportunity to reach 400-500 compliance executives at global public companies. The event runs May 18-20 at the Mayflower Hotel in Washington D.C.
The presenting sponsors have been identified, but we still have the following available:
Pocket Agenda -$3,500. For convenience purposes and quick reference, Compliance Week will print out a multi page (folding) condensed agenda. Each of the 450 attendees will receive this condensed agenda. The sponsor receives branding on the front cover and logo and description within the pages.
Wi-Fi Sponsorship -$6,000. Free Wi-Fi to be provided for all delegates during the 3 day event, courtesy of sponsor. To include:
Password will be sponsor name Card with Wi-Fi instructions given to all at registration, and additional 100 printed for distribution Signage with Wi-Fi Instructions, and Sponsors Logo, at Registration and in multiple locations Recognition at the start of each session on screens in each meeting room
Event App Sponsor -$6,000. A large number of the 450-500 event delegates, and speakers, use our event app to navigate the event. The App Sponsor will receive additional branding in the app. To include:
Welcome screen with Sponsor logo Logo placement on each App area: sessions, speakers, etc. Card with App download instructions given at registration, and additional 100 printed for distribution Recognition at the start of each session on screens in each meeting room Sponsor signage provided throughout
Speaker Lounge Sponsor -$10,000. Food & Beverage provided to speakers, courtesy of sponsor. To include:
TV provided in lounge with sponsor Logo and messaging provided on loop Branding/signage in room Sponsor material/collateral available
The event website is http://conference.complianceweek.com/cw-2015/home-cw2015.aspx.
Please let me know if you have questions or would like to chat on the phone. Thanks for your consideration.
-Doug
---------------------------------- Doug Juenemann Advertising Sales Compliance Week 77 N Washington St. Boston, MA 02114 djuenemann@complianceweek.com (617) 570 8610
